constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of side dormer and extension to outrigger.
decision_conditions: The erection of side dormer and extension to outrigger falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B  of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

In accordance with the requirements of Local Government Act 1972 The Plans / Drawings / Documents submitted with the application are available on the Council's website.https://www.kingston.gov.uk/info/200155/planning_applications_and_permissions/263/find_a_planning_application_or_appeal

You are required to complete the 'Determining whether a Development may be CIL Liable Planning Application Additional Information Requirement form'. This form can be downloaded from the planning portal at https://ecab.planningportal.co.uk/uploads/1app/forms/form_1_cil_additional_information.pdf . Please complete and return as soon as possible.
